snippet.title: Epiphany City - Official Premiere Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1508530/Epiphany_City/
Join the beta: https://www.EpiphanyCity.com/demo


EPIPHANY CITY is a mind-bending puzzle adventure game where you use magical picture frames to manipulate the world around you. Reframe objects to suit your needs in imaginative ways. Follow Lily, an artist on the brink of despair, as she steals powers from the strongest superhero, leaving it up to her to save the world.


Youtube chapters:
0:00 - Cold open
0:21 - Story
0:51 - Gameplay
1:23 - Epic Twists
1:26 - Splash Art
1:31 - Wishlist on Steam!
